Title: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: Official Spare Coin Rep on September 02, 2013, 10:53 pm
                                                    :) :P :D Greetings everyone! :D :P :)
______________________________________________________________________________

****Please read the rules even if you're planning to help someone out! Instead of helping a scumbag you could be helping an established buyer. ****

1  ) Anyone can ask for coins!
2  ) Don't take advantage of this.  Know your limits.
3  ) When requesting POST YOUR SR NAME so we know where to send to.  DON'T ASSUME WE KNOW.
4  ) Declare a time frame for when you will be able to reimburse.
5  ) Keep the amounts requested and loaned sensible.  Nothing that would make or break someone when lending.
6  ) This thread is for "I am short .XX for my order".  Not "I need a hand out in general".  No panhandling.
7  ) State your request in ฿.  We are everywhere!
8  ) Have one loan out at one time.  Refer to #2.
9  ) >:( DO NOT PM PEOPLE FOR COINS. >:( Keep all communication within the thread.  The thread also serves as a record so we can give credit where it is due.
10) It is not required but encouraged to eat ice cream.

Legend:
[++++] Recently added.


Follow the rules and you will have a much better chance of being helped out.
∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆
                                                                    Notes

If you have been missed and would like to be thanked or have someone to add to the shit list, please feel free to PM the Rep. 

∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆∆

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread
Post by: BoxofShapes on September 09, 2013, 09:31 pm
Quote from: ImAz on September 09, 2013, 09:07 pm
So is this the new thread for peeps asking for coin or is it trusted members asking for coins?

I am lost...and scared.

We can't prevent anyone from asking.  That would be impossible and ridiculous to me.  We can only regulate it better.  We hopefully have made the best step for it. 

We could add another list of people known for paying back tho.  I've thought about it.  Might have people complaining and saying "you inclusive fucks"  but fuck em cause we have been screwed over too much.

I just hate the idea of a members only thread tho.  We could push out some really cool people along the way.  I just try to encourage people to do a little research before they lend.  Another big reminder that I want to throw out there is you don't have to lend anything to contribute.  The thread became so much more than spare coins anyway. 

@Anxious

Thats a bit more than spare change man but I wish you luck on that sir.  I hope you understand.  Thanks for posting in the right thread thoough.

Quote from: ImAz on September 09, 2013, 10:22 pm
DMT topic...have you ever seen the machine elves? ***CLEARNET*** https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machine_elf

I've seen plenty of entities, some recognizable and humanoid, others, while "visually" unidentifiable, had a familiarity that made them instantly recognizable as "people" of some sort or another.

When I was journeying into entheospace fairly regularly (2-4 times/month for a few months), I had a recurrent theme on some, but not all, trips, where it was like I was visiting a town, and each trip took me to a different home. Once I was in what struck me as some sort of hyperspatial bachelorette pad, and the entity I met there was easily visually and otherwise recognizable as a young woman.

A much weirder instance is the time I walked up to what appeared to me to be a family picnic, the elf-space equivalent of suburban home, mom, dad, 2 kids, steaks on the grill, and a excitable ball of light that I immediately identified as a dog/puppy running around everywhere, very playful. All of this made complete sense at the time.

One of the more sinister entities I encountered is the first time I tried Sally and The Deemster. There was probably 20mg or so of DMT in my steamroller (best smoking device ever, btw), plus any residue in the screens (usually not enough to break through on its own), on top of which I added some 10x Salvia leaf. I may have weighed it out at the time, but I don't remember now. It wasn't much.

As soon as I got that second hit in, and held it, there was this bizarre entity that approached me quickly, directly from the front, which was at once off-putting, as usually the entities I encounter are a little more relaxed, and while interested in me, not all up in my face about it. It was vaguely humanoid, the first figure that comes to mind is the iconic "Burning Man" image:
\  o  /
 \ | /
   |
   |
 /  \
/    \

As it approached me, instead of cocking its head to the side, as one might expect an entity to do when encountering something unknown, its whole torso bent 90 degrees a little above where the human waist would be, and she just kind of stared at me a bit. Weirded me out a bit. Oddly enough, I just kept telling myself that Harvey Wallclimber was a little orange cat (as opposed to the barrage of bizarre imagery/linguistic objects presented to me by the Salvia people), and a few minutes later, I was back out, and there was an orange cat on my lap to comfort me. Harvey be praised!

Post by: anonypunk on September 12, 2013, 11:54 pm
Quote from: ChemCat on September 12, 2013, 03:11 am
Now, if you don't mind, what brought you to ask me this question?

I'm Curious :)  Whether ya know it or not, it's questions such as you've just asked ....that Build a trusting Relationship.  I'm pretty paranoid, so i don't sell to anyone....if i can help it...ya know?

So, if you will...Please let me know what led you to ask me the question which you've just asked  :)

Well I saw that you had a vendors account and I want one b/c I am wanting to get rid of some oversupply. The thing is I don't really want to get back into selling a lot. I wanted to get it b/c I often find great deals on great products IRL and could pass on decent deals to others and make money at it too. I wasn't sure or not how much business you did but it seemed that it wasn't a full time thing for you for the most part and I figured you could help me make a decision. The cost is kind of up there for a vendor account considering I will only be able to get rid of excess right now. I could actually probably make my bond back immediately but I thought to myself "but then what" ya know? Anyway. You answered my question to the point without me even asking it fully. Pretty awesome. Oh next time you stock some dmt let me know b/c that is one I've really been interested in. Experienced way too much of other substances but think this could be neat. I've never read about anyone having some ground breaking introspection with this. Can it be used as a tool like I do with shrooms? Thanks!
Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (New! Please Request Here Instead of Old Thread)
Post by: BoxofShapes on September 13, 2013, 12:05 am
Quote from: anonypunk on September 12, 2013, 11:54 pm
I've never read about anyone having some ground breaking introspection with this. Can it be used as a tool like I do with shrooms? Thanks!

I mean whenever I've had shrooms, i've always been able to have some level of being able to interact with what's "outside". 

DMT there isn't anything beyond just sitting in a chair for 15 minutes.  It's not so much as can it be used, but more like you have no choice.

Just my opinion though.
Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (New! Please Request Here Instead of Old Thread)
Post by: anonypunk on September 13, 2013, 12:18 am
That's what I was thinking it was like at the moment. Oftentimes with mushrooms it is after I have come down quite a bit that the thoughts I had (if I was specifically working on an issue in my life) would come back with a clearly defined way to integrate my newly found perspective with a way of dealing with it in reality. I'm not sure if that makes sense but that is how I work with it and how it works for me at least.

That's what I was thinking it was like at the moment. Oftentimes with mushrooms it is after I have come down quite a bit that the thoughts I had (if I was specifically working on an issue in my life) would come back with a clearly defined way to integrate my newly found perspective with a way of dealing with it in reality. Eh..... I'm a little lost in interpreting but I think I get it.  I think I've been there.  The thoughts that were bouncing around wildly during the trip start to compile and order.

With DMT it was more like a lot at once and when I came back, it was just a bunch of "what the fuck just happend?!?"  Very short trip but the differences it made revealed in the following days/weeks.  Had long streaks of, or what I thought was, deja vu.

Just my experience.  Don't think it's like that for everyone.

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (New! Please Request Here Instead of Old Thread)
Post by: ChronicDemon on September 14, 2013, 02:53 pm
Reposting ( Since noone ever checks previous pages )

HERE'S THE STORY. And Below it you can find me, begging like a hobo.

9/13/13
Woke up, ate, played some games, checked SR and SRF.
Get a call from an ex, she needs a place to crash for a few nights.
No big deal to me, cause im a kind person and always have room in my home for friends down on their luck.
Well, she shows up, we talk, smoke some weed and chill for a bit. 2 days go by like this, everything was going good till i went to go make my daily errand run ( Cigs, gas, look at guitars and such in the pawnshop downtown. )
Well, me being the trusting person i am didnt expect to come home to find my entire room had been rummaged through, and my Ex was nowhere to be found.

She managed to get off with my credit card, some old jewelry ( Gold chain, gold ring ) And not to mention my fucking weed ( honestly i was more bummed about losing my weed than anything...cause i was furious and had nothing to calm me down )

So I had been gone for maybe 4-5 hours. After doing a check around the house to see if she took anything else of value i checked my card balance and she had maxxed out the remaining 500$ from an ATM ( she knew my pin from when we use to date ) And she has perfect timing to...Cause my bill is due monday.. So, with the remaining money i had left, i went to the bank and paid off the debt and canceled the card.

See, i had thought i set aside 200$ from my check to tide me over for food but must've had my head in the clouds when counting cause i certainly did not. And it's not like i can go back to the bank and be like " Oh hey, yea....remember the debt i paid off and that card i closed?...yea...im gonna need that back.. "

And now here i am, penniless and trying to come up with enough $ to tide me over till i get my next check @.@

All i can say is...Im thoroughly disappointed in the girl, but i can't be too mad, She's a junkie and i guess when you still kinda care for someone, you try to see the best in them, and they only shit on your expectations.

Quote from: ChronicDemon on September 14, 2013, 05:57 am
I'll be accepting donations for the " ChronicDemon Is Broke as shit and needs food " Charity

All proceeds will go to me, for the event of feeding me...cause im broke...

( Long story short, Someone maxxed out my Credit card so im stuck with top ramen and air for like 2 weeks so my entire paycheck aside from like 30$ went to paying the bill. And me, being quick to pay my debts, didnt realize how completely out of food i was till it was too late.)

;3 If you're feeling generous please send me some coin lol.

I only need maybe 40-50$, which will be enough to buy alot of hotdogs and microwave burritos to last me till payday.

Can repay in 2 weeks when my paycheck comes in.

No, none of this coin is going to SR or Drugs, It is going to my wallet in my pants, so i can go buy some fucking food and not live like a hobo.
I have a buyer already lined up whos gonna pay me Via Western Union once i have some coins.

( Anything donated will be refunded in 2 weeks!, I'm a man of my word as clearly shown in previous loans given to me by you lovely lovely people )

All donations can be sent to my SR account : AncientX0

Or my Public BTC Wallet : 18FBCn9pC6G3db5FUNZULbnwvpbARPwHny

I do apologize for coming to you guys with this. and it makes me feel pretty low that i have to ask for handouts to get food :c

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (New! Please Request Here Instead of Old Thread)
Post by: doodoo79 on September 15, 2013, 11:41 am
Good morning folks. I've made a few posts on this thread and you all seem like a friendly bunch so I thought I'd introduce myself. I've participated in both borrowing and lending, but I see that this thread is also sometimes just for shootin' the shit. So a little about me, I'm a 33 year old male and I've worked as a toolmaker for just under ten years. I live at the beach so I love any and everything to do with the ocean; fishing, surfing, kayaking, camping. I do like to party, I guess my d.o.c. is dope, but I'm on suboxone maintenance so I don't do it a lot. I'll usually order a gram about every other week and get high for a couple days and that's it. Recently I've begun re-exploring psychedelics. I live in the south so I can pick all the cubensis I want, other than that I really like DMT, MDA, MDMA, and a couple R.C.'s.

When I order I usually don't spend every last coin on charity buys, so I usually have some change in my account. You regulars feel free to hit me up if you're ever a few dollars short. I don't spend every waking moment on SR or the forums, so feel free to leave a PM.

My doctor told me to stay away from coke. So I bought a fifteen-foot straw.  -- Stupid joke I know, but I've always heard it's a good way to break the ice.

Alright, so I hope everyone's day is easy like Sunday morning.

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (New! Please Request Here Instead of Old Thread)
Post by: BoxofShapes on September 15, 2013, 04:04 pm
Quote from: doodoo79 on September 15, 2013, 11:41 am
Good morning folks. I've made a few posts on this thread and you all seem like a friendly bunch so I thought I'd introduce myself. I've participated in both borrowing and lending, but I see that this thread is also sometimes just for shootin' the shit. So a little about me, I'm a 33 year old male and I've worked as a toolmaker for just under ten years. I live at the beach so I love any and everything to do with the ocean; fishing, surfing, kayaking, camping. I do like to party, I guess my d.o.c. is dope, but I'm on suboxone maintenance so I don't do it a lot. I'll usually order a gram about every other week and get high for a couple days and that's it. Recently I've begun re-exploring psychedelics. I live in the south so I can pick all the cubensis I want, other than that I really like DMT, MDA, MDMA, and a couple R.C.'s.

When I order I usually don't spend every last coin on charity buys, so I usually have some change in my account. You regulars feel free to hit me up if you're ever a few dollars short. I don't spend every waking moment on SR or the forums, so feel free to leave a PM.

My doctor told me to stay away from coke. So I bought a fifteen-foot straw.  -- Stupid joke I know, but I've always heard it's a good way to break the ice.

Alright, so I hope everyone's day is easy like Sunday morning.

I freakin love this guy.  Glad you finally stepped in and said hey.  We need your kind around man!  Keep sharing that attitude you had when you pm'ed me!  Others need it as well!

Welcome!

I do like to party, I guess my d.o.c. is dope, but I'm on suboxone maintenance so I don't do it a lot. I'll usually order a gram about every other week and get high for a couple days and that's it. Recently I've begun re-exploring psychedelics. I live in the south so I can pick all the cubensis I want, other than that I really like DMT, MDA, MDMA, and a couple R.C.'s.

When I order I usually don't spend every last coin on charity buys, so I usually have some change in my account. You regulars feel free to hit me up if you're ever a few dollars short. I don't spend every waking moment on SR or the forums, so feel free to leave a PM.

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (New! Please Request Here Instead of Old Thread)
Post by: ImAz on September 15, 2013, 09:02 pm
Hello bitches...

Hope are all well on this autumn day! So beautiful here today, that I wish all you crusty hippies were here, nude with me, all tripping on 2i!

Talking 2i...I got my shipment of 25i-NBome 1400µg tabs...I had ordered 25i-NBome 800µg from the seller before and wanted an increase in dose...

I was in a rush and took two 25i-NBome 1400µg tabs! I was meaning to take one...but took two, forgetting the increase of dose...I am 5'10" 15 stone...let me tell you that it was the best trip that I have ever had...the visuals were a bit intense. However, I am good at controlling my trips, turned on BBC Radio 1xtra and watched the show!!!

Brobras, it was awesome...I have never tried acid...however, I am sure this would have been close...

well I am finally out from under the bed and seem not to be as paranoid as before...now I am have jerkstore issues...I am going from 0 to asshole in 3 seconds...going to have a list of shit to talk to m dr about....

Well back to tv/reading/lurking

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (New! Please Request Here Instead of Old Thread)
Post by: doodoo79 on September 15, 2013, 11:23 pm

Holy shit bro! I took 1800ug 2 or 3 weeks ago and thought I was having epileptic seizures, though my head stayed pretty damn clear. My GF took the same and she was in WAY worse shape than me. She shook non stop for 4 hours and puked her guts out. And we've been around the psychedelic block. After that I did a little research on Erowid and found out a girl in my city died last year from 25i-NBOMe. The newspaper article didn't state the dose, but did say that they were pills. Her boyfriend who gave them to her was charged with murder. I guess in my state there is one precedent case where a kid was convicted for providing MDMA (supposedly) to a girl who died from OD. Careful with that shit bro, seems kinda unpredictable. As for me and mine, never again.

---Just occurred to me, I think you gave me the loan for the shipping to get that 25i Boxy! It may have been 25c. One of those. By the way in my opinion 25c is way better than 25i. But you know what they say about opinions...

Post by: BoxofShapes on September 16, 2013, 10:35 pm
Quote from: anonypunk on September 16, 2013, 09:45 pm
Hey Boxy. I saw in the "What Music Are You Listening to Now?" thread that you like electronic someone mentioned. Old school raver by chance?

Sort of. 

I know what people are talking about when they say, "how it used to be", and have had life changing experiences because of it that remain to this day.  I feel like I know what they are referring to when they are talking about extacy from the 90's.  I still own, and wear a few pairs of some "big pants".

But I only got to have a very small amount of experience with the "old school".  It's only cause of where I live.  Where it was happening was pretty far.  With that said I'd say about 75% of my music is electronic, but not so much stuff to dance to.  It's all about if I can sit in a chair with a pair of headphones with some smoke and read it like a book.  I didn't pick up on any DJ's cause that's just not what was around.  There was a time in my life I didn't have internet and couldn't explore my taste, or I might of have.

Grew up with things like underworld, the crystal method, meat beat manifesto, the chemical brothers, future sounds of london, aphex twin/AFX/whatever else he was calling himself, the orb, lords of acid (yes I read your post in the stories about c thread  :P.  Fucking beautiful), just to name the more popular ones.  If I would to pick one group that I could define my tastes in, it would be Boards of Canada.  I can't stop listening to them.

Ah!  Didn't mean to be long winded for a simple question.  Like cryngie said, it's a trip down memory lane.

Post by: anonypunk on September 17, 2013, 05:39 am
Hey DirtyBiscuits I apologize. I'm not sure why I was pissy but it happens sometimes. Deleted that post too. I sincerely apologize. It's like I've been playing the "Jump to Conclusions" game mentioned in Office Space.  derp. Peace?

Boxy - Loved all those that you mentioned so I feel ya man. =) Good times man. I haven't heard of Boards of Canada. Going to check them out right now. Yeah you know I dated myself hardcore mentioning Tricky and Lords of Acid. haha         
    Oh man. Have you seen the Chemical Brothers - Salmon Dance video? It's pretty damned funny. First time I saw I was on MDMA here this year. I don't know why but it always puts a smile on my face. The fish in an aquarium sing a song about the Salmon Dance and it's pretty trippy. For instance the puffer fish puffs up with air every time the bass hits. You should check it out. =P
Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (New! Please Request Here Instead of Old Thread)
Post by: BoxofShapes on September 17, 2013, 06:12 am
ehh.  I dated myself right there. 

Dude.  I am freaking out cause I am getting to see tricky for the first time ever.  Like I never thought this would happen.  It's unreal to me!

I've seen all the videos from chemical brothers!  Salmon can go to japan and back.  I know that for a fact now. 

I'd have to say the video for Star Guitar is my favorite.  It compares to the whole theme of your surroundings with the music.  I was on a train when I was listening to the song, and thought to myself "something just fits perfectly here".  Really funny when I got around to watching the video later.  You must give it a try!

Boards are pretty hit or miss with people.  Give the album "music has the right to children" a try and go from there if you have the curiosity.
They don't really have any impressive video's but they don't really need them.

IMO they are one of best ambient acts ever , there a bit more upbeat for the most part but still veyr ambient  , there album implant is my faveorate , it´´s a work of perfection ,,, word fail misarabley to describe just how imersive and  original there work is , itś crazy there not as well known as the orb and fsol ect .

I'm right there with ya.  Want this weekend to happen so I can take a trip.

Here's whats up. Both DefyCode and I won. Both of us live in the US. CharlesFloyed offered me an SR coupon in place of the 1.5 grams of cocaine I won since he didn't ship to the US. This cost me $14usd to accept my "prize". I was thankful and looking forward to getting that coin in my account which I assumed would have been enough to purchase 1.5 grams here in the US. At his prices it would have been $160usd which was perfect. I messaged him and messaged him again asking him if I should just cancel my order since he wasnt responding. It was a full week before I got a single response. Well since I was expecting that coin...(he is a vendor and you'd think if he was offering a prize like that he'd have the funds)...I didn't buy the amount of BTC I really needed. He finally responded saying that I would get my prize....but it's only going to be 60 euros which is not even enough to afford half the prize I won. Why have a fucking contest if you're not going to give out the prize or do what you're going to say?

Missed out on Subs H because of this and I had been looking forward to that for a month. I bought some stamps off a new vendor but they have yet to arrive. I have been taking a few too many opiates this week. NOW I'm fucking hurting!!!! I've got 0.09 btc since I just cancelled that order with CharlesFloyd and placed an MXE order. Not even enough to get shit. Got money in the bank but no btc in my account and absolutely no opiates to help me through. I have no GOOD street connects for that either. This is why I try to avoid getting to that point...because I hate feeling the need physically to dose. Hell I usually don't indulge more than a few days anymore. I'm not sure if you guys knows how this feels but it sucks. I don't even have benzo's to help. Bones aching like a motherfucker too.

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: Remediless on September 20, 2013, 11:25 pm
I really love this thread and think the idea of lending and repaying genuine people who are a little short on their order is a beautiful one. But as we've seen, it's open to abuse. What's to stop someone like Locker coming back under a new alias, spamming his way to 50 posts then popping in here and a few other threads and getting more money for his trips chuckling to himself as kind souls' money hits his new (or even his old account if he simply gives out his wallet address) and re-running the fun?

Have you guys thought about adding some kind of time limit that users have to have been on the forum for before they start asking for coin or do you genuinely rely on people having some kind of decency?

Personally, I won't lend to newbies, only people who've been on the forums long enough to have built some kind of reputation...and a quick flick through recent post history generally speaks volumes...But that's just me.

Just my 0.2 BTC's worth.
Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)

Quote from: Dougggy on September 20, 2013, 10:55 pm
Will add all my loans into my sig in the morning, need to go to bed for once. ::)
~D

We like that around here!

I do the same thing with money I've borrowed and not paid back yet and money that I have loaned out and isn't paid back yet. I don't do it to embarrass anyone or to make myself look good, it's just an easy way to keep up with everything.
Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: BoxofShapes on September 20, 2013, 11:45 pm
Quote from: Remediless on September 20, 2013, 11:25 pm
I really love this thread and think the idea of lending and repaying genuine people who are a little short on their order is a beautiful one. But as we've seen, it's open to abuse. What's to stop someone like Locker coming back under a new alias, spamming his way to 50 posts then popping in here and a few other threads and getting more money for his trips chuckling to himself as kind souls' money hits his new (or even his old account if he simply gives out his wallet address) and re-running the fun?

Have you guys thought about adding some kind of time limit that users have to have been on the forum for before they start asking for coin or do you genuinely rely on people having some kind of decency?

Personally, I won't lend to newbies, only people who've been on the forums long enough to have built some kind of reputation...and a quick flick through recent post history generally speaks volumes...But that's just me.

Just my 0.2 BTC's worth.

I always say the person who has the coins sets the rules for who and they lend to and how.  There is no stopping just any asshole and posting in the thread.  darkmagic is a perfect example.  We can only educate people who want to help out to be on guard.  I would hope a 50 poster would be kind of obvious. 

The biggest rule I stress is never give what you can't loose.  I would have never given to locker, but I was treating it like it wasn't my coin because it was a gift, which is insane in retrospect. 

I don't know.  I don't feel there is a good answer for this.  This thread is kind of a jar of honey on a window sill to the people who have no shame.

I do like the tip for the time limit thing though.  Maybe I could write some tips for the OP or something as well.
Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: Remediless on September 21, 2013, 12:01 am
I just thought I'd ask as not everyone checks the time people have been on the forums or post history. Like, for example, I would no way lend to someone who made an account last week and has already been asking for loans in other threads. But I've seen it happens - some people are so kind and generous I guess they forget to check these things and as always, you're right Box, the thread is a jar of honey for the baddies who WILL be back, all smiles and appreciative thanks but laughing up their sleeves as they slide away into the night.

'Doesn't apply to me at the moment as a potential lender though, 'cause I'm keeping my account at something like 0.00001 BTC.in a bid to have a little break from caning it next week. We'll see how long that lasts, eh? ;)

Anyway, have a lovely Friday evening/ Saturday morning my SR sugarpuffs xx
Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: staind on September 21, 2013, 12:13 am
I guess it's all personal judgement.

I once loaned to a dude in the newbie section ( i think he had just a handful  of posts), he turned out to be one of the most reliable persons i met here. gave him 3-4 loans since, still hasn't got above 65 posts i think.
So a shot in the dark from time to time can turn into a pleasant contact. Just keep the amount low.


Also don't blindly trust the karma system. That's why i don't like the + karma thread. I don't mind people posting in it in general but almost every page there is a scammer with incredible karma. bodnu or i3lazd for instance.

edit: Karma: +275/-218  that is i3lazd's karma. Couldn't believe that after all the shit is been doing.
Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: Dougggy on September 21, 2013, 12:15 am
Quote from: Remediless on September 21, 2013, 12:01 am
Like, for example, I would no way lend to someone who made an account last week and has already been asking for loans in other threads.

Not sure if this is aimed at me, but I'm just happy that someone could trust me. I obviously can't do anything to build up trust apart from being on the forum for a while and repaying loans. (The other loan thread was a small amount and was payed back when I said it would be :) )
One thing I made sure I didn't do was spam to 50, it gives anyone a bad image. I wouldn't ask unless I needed a loan, and knew for certain that I could pay back :).

Quote from: Remediless on September 21, 2013, 12:01 am
Like, for example, I would no way lend to someone who made an account last week and has already been asking for loans in other threads.

Not sure if this is aimed at me, but I'm just happy that someone could trust me. I obviously can't do anything to build up trust apart from being on the forum for a while and repaying loans. (The other loan thread was a small amount and was payed back when I said it would be :) )
One thing I made sure I didn't do was spam to 50, it gives anyone a bad image. I wouldn't ask unless I needed a loan, and knew for certain that I could pay back :).
And of course, locker had been on the forum for 15 or something months, and look how that turned out  ::)
~D

'Thought you were off to bed ;) and no I'm not having a pop at you and yes it is good that people trust you so soon. As well as the newbie spare coins thread, didn't that guy in the bitcoin transfer thread give you 20 euros as well?

Anyway, I was talking in general about anyone who joined this forum recently and suddenly wants coin and saying that I *personally* won't be lending to anyone new (and no offense, that includes you) from now on. If others do then good for you and I hope you do indeed repay their good faith and kindness.

Yes Locker was here for a long time, but I was also talking about him and that Darkmagic prick and others coming back on new accounts all hearts and smiles and wanting money - which is why I'm wary is all.

Talking of Locker...he's just this moment logged on :-O talk of the devil and all that...

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: BoxofShapes on September 21, 2013, 12:36 am
Quote from: staind on September 21, 2013, 12:13 am
I guess it's all personal judgement.

I once loaned to a dude in the newbie section ( i think he had just a handful  of posts), he turned out to be one of the most reliable persons i met here. gave him 3-4 loans since, still hasn't got above 65 posts i think.
So a shot in the dark from time to time can turn into a pleasant contact. Just keep the amount low.


Also don't blindly trust the karma system. That's why i don't like the + karma thread. I don't mind people posting in it in general but almost every page there is a scammer with incredible karma. bodnu or i3lazd for instance.

edit: Karma: +275/-218  that is i3lazd's karma. Couldn't believe that after all the shit is been doing.

It's extremely hard to tell.  Like you said I've had people pretty brand new be more reliable, than people that have been here since it started.

I've had people with really bad karma be awesome people and people with something pretty up there, drop off the face of the earth.

I don't like the +K thread either.  Happy to say I've never once posted in there.

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: doodoo79 on September 21, 2013, 02:40 am
Quote from: Remediless on September 21, 2013, 12:01 am
I just thought I'd ask as not everyone checks the time people have been on the forums or post history. Like, for example, I would no way lend to someone who made an account last week and has already been asking for loans in other threads. But I've seen it happens - some people are so kind and generous I guess they forget to check these things and as always, you're right Box, the thread is a jar of honey for the baddies who WILL be back, all smiles and appreciative thanks but laughing up their sleeves as they slide away into the night.


Yeah, one got me on 9/1. Granted it was only for like .006 btc. BUT, I didn't gift it to him and he swore up and down he'd pay it back. It's NOT about the money, it's practically nothing. It's about being a big boy and paying your loans back, however large or small they may be. It could've been an opportunity for him to get a loan repayment in the books.  Oh yeah, this guy spammed to fifty to beg for change on his 53rd post. But I usually give people the benefit of the doubt, so I sent the change. He hasn't been on the forums since 9/3.

He initially said he'd pay it back in a week or two. So now it's been three weeks so I sent him a polite reminder about the loan. Here's what I got back: "If you wanna go tell the forums that im a liar and nobody should lend to me ever again feel free, Im not gonna take loans anymore anyway and I dont give a fuck what they think anyway, and oh yeah, its just 5 cents (actually ~ 75 cents) and I will pay you back soon." I wasn't harassing the guy over change, just a friendly reminder, that's all. That's an example of that attitude that BOS was talking about that we don't need around here. He could've just said "It's gonna be xx more days" or even "can we just call it a gift?" But no, he just had to shoot his mouth off.

Does everyone feel me about it not being about the miniscule amount of money, but the concept of receiving a loan and paying it back? I'm not gonna mention him by name in this post, but it's not too hard to figure out who I'm speaking of.
Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: cryngie on September 21, 2013, 03:03 am
Yes I believe its about the honor of keeping your word...  when I first came to this thread I lent coins to quite a few people lots of which never repaid, but I felt the need to contribute before asking for loans 

This is from my SR inbox about a loan from the 23rd July I was told would be repaid in a week I waited 4 weeks to msg them about it and Im still getting fucked around by this joke....................latest at top

cryngie
   Listen up, when you asked to borrow those coins you specified 7days till paying back. Now after that week was over did you msg me? no Did you msg me at any point to explain what was going on? no You see I waited 1 month before msging you to see if you would come through and msg/repay me, it took you a further 3 weeks to reply to that msg with I can repay now and please dont put me on the shit list.
Then you start asking about the exchange rate, read the rules of the thread you borrow XXbtc you repay XXbtc but i said whatever just trying to get some btc back (realise if I didnt lend it to you I would still have .08btc. Then the pin problems, ok i can understand that So I msg you agin after 2 days and you say 30hrs to go so I msg you again after another 5days(120hrs). No reply, so I wait another 24hrs+ then msg again this time informing you of my intentions to put you on the list and bam under 16hrs and you reply............................
Then you call me a dick, I did you a favor, someone I dont know who missed the time frame to repay,didnt contact me until I contacted you, say you can repay in 30hrs, then ignore msg's and still hasnt repaid and Im a dick?

You say heres your money so why havent you sent it then? hmmm
How am I supposed to know when you're online or not? The shear fact is I lent you coin, you were supposed to repay in 7days and on monday it'll have been 2 months, at any point a quick msg telling me what was happening would have been gratly appreciated but no I had to chase you

So kindly repay the btc so I can move on    7 hours    read

Done acid for many years bud, most would tell you to to play it safe with the half first as 210ug is a dose that can lead to a "spiritual" insight in to yourself, loss of ego and very intense trip if you've not had much previous experience with it and are not in your most relaxed environment then I would say play it safe too but if you've done it before or feel like having a night to remember do the full tab.

Hope that helps a little.

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: Remediless on September 21, 2013, 03:07 pm
Quote from: CLK on September 21, 2013, 02:16 pm
Quote from: Dougggy on September 21, 2013, 01:40 pm
Quote from: mary666 on September 21, 2013, 12:32 pm
Quote from: DanDanTheIceCreamMan on September 21, 2013, 11:59 am
Damn, a bowl left, 2 bong hits left.. you guys need to plan ahead! I think I would freak out if I was running out of weed :o
I am freaking out  ::) Still trying to find some  ;)
What country do you live in? Weed is everywhere where I am here in the UK ::)
Just a question to you all;
I want to try one of the 210ug tabs before the 'gathering' (Not such a party  ;D), but I will be on my own. Should I start with half a tab or go straight in for a whole one? Going to have a little read of the kybalion, attempt to meditate and just go with it. I'll have to see how it goes anyway.
~D

Quite alot of how strong/weak it might effect you depends on bodyweight, bigger people generally need to take more to receive the desired effect. This your first time on acid? Whats your exp with psychs and rough weight and we'd be able to advise you better pal, acid needs to be treated with respect, especially if its your first time!

Yeah CLK is right. Def need more info to give you proper advice.

I used to do loads of LSD and mushrooms and one thing with trips I found was (and everyone will say this) is that it's much better if you're tripping with really good friends whom you can trust. I used to much prefer tripping at home with my friends. We were out at a bar once and the barman started looking like an owl and once one of us mentioned it, we were all hallucinating the same thing and started laughing uncontrollably and then figured we needed to get our tripped-out arses out of there and home. That's the funny thing with trips- one of you can see one thing then mentions it and you all see the same thing, whether it's looking at your hands and having foot-long fingers or suddenly looking at the light and it turning into a 3D eye you all start seeing it - you get the picture. We walked through the fields to get back rather than the road the time with the barman/ owl and that's cool too going out and being at one with nature. I was never one for "finding myself" on acid, I used to like having a good 8-hour long laugh. But new places/ people can be a bit weird on acid especially if you're on your own and get the dose wrong. That said, I did some at a school disco once - teachers were there and everything but I'd done it loads by then (started young lol) I only did half a tab and it was a real laugh once I'd come up.

Weight/ rough age / previous psychedelic experience are the factors to consider before we can help on working out the exact dose which is obviously imperative if you're gonna be on your own. Sometimes just a half too much can freak you out if you've not worked it all out properly.

If you go into it with a happy, open mind free of guilt and nagging paranoia or insecurities that could send you off on a bad one you should have fun. :D

Oh yeah, can't remember if this is bollocks or not, but we used to believe that if you had a bad trip and drank orange juice that helped you come down. Maybe someone else can confirm if this is an old wives' tale. The SR forum user 'Vanquish' is the go to authority on trips.  He's got a thread on the go several topics below this one if you have q's.

No you had it kind of backwards.  You needed to take vitamin C or something like orange juice if you wanted to trip harder.  You drank milk if you wanted to calm down.  I have no clue if it's factual or not.  My only logic in this tale is milk is a base on the ph scale, and acid....i guess is on the acid side.  I've done it but I don't know if it made a difference.

~D

Never did 2c-b + DMT so I can't comment on that.  I have however done 1000ug 2c-c-NBOMe + 1200ug 2c-i-NBOMe + DMT and hyperspace was reached with the greatest of ease. Definitely the strongest psychedelic experience I've ever been through. I wish DMT lasted long enough to really explore around and sort it all out so you could bring back complete memories from it. I guess that's what Ayahuasca'a for, but I don't know that I'd wanna be trapped in that state for such a long period. If it turned on you you'd be in for a shitty experience. Plus MAOI's scare me. But of course I have no problem injecting something I ordered off of the internet into my bloodstream!

Post by: Remediless on September 22, 2013, 08:01 pm

Quote from: staind on September 22, 2013, 06:09 pm
Honestly, i am really not cool with people pming me for a loan. If one wants to spare something, one would look in this thread anyway.

What he said. >:(

I agree with all this a million %.

What the thread boils down to for me is that it's a gentleman's agreement borrowing coins to help fill your much-wanted order.

To my mind:- Lenders shouldn't have to ask continually for loans back they should be paid back as and when agreed. New borrowers ought to build up a little trust and goodwill by making small loans before piling in and taking advantage of the goodwill here and absolutely loans should be repaid before new ones are taken out.

It's such a wonderful thread and if people bear these small and basic rules of etiquette in mind when borrowing then it doesn't spoil things for everyone else.

Someone hasn't paid me back for a good 8 weeks or more and they were so thankful when I initially made the loan, because it really got them out of a jam. And yet I haven't heard a dicky bird since... I don't want to put: "nag scumbag for coins I lent them" on my to-do list because it's long enough already...

Just did some searching about snorting freebase dmt and it sounds pretty painful. But they do say it works good and the trip lasts longer with a gentler come up and come down. It might be interesting because you'll actually have time to explore the hyperspace. Vaping it is great and all, but it's just so much, so fast, that it's hard to kinda be like "Alright, here I am. Let's see what I can do in this bizarro world." You know what I mean?

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: foxen624 on September 23, 2013, 04:14 pm
Quote from: Dougggy on September 23, 2013, 03:27 pm
Is there anywhere I can get bitcoins for my paysafe cards? If I can manage It I will be able to pay you all back  a little early :)
~D

I assume you're not in the US as I've never heard of paysafe cards.  But, I've found that the easiest and most anonymous way to get btc is to go through a SR vendor.  I get MoneyPaks and go look under "Money" --> "Digital Currancy" and see who is currently accepting MP.  The listings seem to come and go fairly quickly, but since I've only looked in particular for those taking MoneyPak, I don't know if there are vendors that accept paysafe cards, but seems like it would be worth checking into...  unless you already have and had no luck.  Just a suggestion...  best of luck to you otherwise.  :)

I will have to wait for the product to arrive, sell it to my folks, deposit the money I earn on my bank account and wait for the damn btc wallet to complete the transaction. You will be compensated within three weeks. I know that this is a long time and most people aren't willing to wait that long, but I'm saying three weeks because I'm 100% sure you'll be paid back by then. Most likely you'll have the money back in two weeks but I'm not making promises. Three weeks is my guarantee to you. SR name is "Rasty1234"

Regards

I did a post a bit back about my upcoming foot surgery, having a new fracture repaired and the old implant replaced with a solid titanium bolt the length of the bone. NOT FUN. I haven't been able to go out and dance with wild reckless abandon since Dec. 2011, when I am fairly certain I broke it in the first place....but oh, what a fucking night...there were  a few jeffries, and rubbing the furry speakers, and lotsa perky nips all happy happy to be seen by their admirers. hur hur hur to that night!

I am in a peculiar mood, the wind is blowing from the East, and it is 13yrs to the day from when I got splatted and my entire path changed.

Meh, I was just curious to how bad it could really be, and I definitely underestimated it ::)
I'm haven't got time to write a full trip report, but it was the most powerful feeling of my 'life' (A term which I have come to question afterwards).
I ended up emptying my bin at one point to be sick in (Although I never was, the drip was 10x worse than the burn), and I was falling into it flipping around for about 5 minutes. When thinking about the real world i kept reminding myself that that was just a dream, and that me, now is what I am. I don't have family/friends, this is my life.

Peak lasted about 20 minutes, the whole thing for about an hour. I'm glad it happened though!
~D

Yes it is the same.

I will say this: I love getting samples. But I also like to help people out. Vendors need people they can rely on to be honest and I'm really not into being grouped into reviewer groups so much. The thing is...there are so many shady folks popping in to make quick cash and fuck people over that it's upsetting. I am trying to find vendors That I know I can trust and I have a few so I can build a stable base without having to sell on here. I hope that makes sense.

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: foxen624 on September 27, 2013, 06:41 am
I just now decided to check all the entries in my Account History to make sure that someone had not paid me back that I had neglected to acknowledge.  Since the log only seems to go back a little over a month and I never wrote any loans down.. I could only go by what was visible and it appears at this time that I have indeed acknowledged all repaid loans to date.  :D    If there were any prior to the cut-off date in the Account History who paid back a loan and I didn't acknowledge it, I truly appologize and you could send me a PM or mention it here in the forum and I'll publicly acknowledge it and +1 you..   ::)

However, I also noticed that there have been 4 loans made in the past month that have not been repaid.  Well now, two of them are shitlisted (BrotherFox and Locker) so... because I don't see the point in even wasting time trying to recover those...   I've mentally written them off and will not loan to them ever again.   >:(

The other two are small amounts - both to people I haven't really had interaction with before or after the loans were made.  These people are not on either the "Big Thanks List", nor are they shitlisted.  I'm showing that:

snooze borrowed 0.04btc on Aug 28

jonnyboy91 borrowed 0.05btc on Sept. 11


Now, honestly, I'm not hurting for btc at the moment and I'm mainly posting this for two reasons.  One, if anyone else is familiar with either of these people and has had either good past experience with them or bad, I'd appreciate knowing about it for future reference.   ???

The other reason, is that in case either person listed above sees this post and has simply forgotten to pay back... that is quite understandable and if that is the case, then just let this serve as a gentle reminder.   ;)    Also, if that is not the case and for whatever reason it would be a hardship for them to repay, I would appreciate a post or a PM to that effect and due to the amounts being as small as they are, as long as they are posting/Pm'ing in good faith, I would be willing to forgive the loans.    8)

Thanks! :)

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: CLK on September 27, 2013, 11:31 pm
I find i still gotta draw back.. its just pretty much impossible. Fucking torture when you're rattling! Only thing worse is trying to use a 18g needle when you usually use 28s or 30s, its like knifing yourself repeatedly

I only went on subbys 2 months ago, my gear habit was ridculous and they doi really do the trick, problem is you literally can't even have a nice blowout, they work too well, esp on daily pickup. Dunno why they put me on suboxone either, most people in uk are on subutex and the naloxone does fuck all! Rather be on these than on those green methadone handcuffs though, never met anyone who its even helped their habit with, they just end u using both.

Phet was from a non-deep web dtch friend, came as a paste that stank to high heaven and had me buzzing off a 40mg bomb, got it a few months back and stashed it in a draw and remembered it at strt of this week and itd all dried out n turned orangey, so i banged some up in a pin and shot away! I swear i've been left with a needle addiction rather than a gear one now. Its alright, nice rush and feels v clean, can still function etc and can ramble on with the best of em, so its top phet! I can see why some phet heads i used to know slammed it 24/7 but nah, its not for me. Not a huge fan of stims, like most i used to love them but started liking downers more and stims less, cause no comedown. Then you find out its addiction instead

Fuck i want some opiates though, i bought some fent off subwu but it must just as he started having problems cause i never recieved owt and now hes gone. Street gear is cheap but shite, and stuff on heres v expensive! But probably worth it, havnt had a chance to try yet cause i'm on daily pickup

/phet inspired mini-rant
Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)

I spent ages on subutex but they started moving everyone onto suboxone strips ive had suboxone a few times but it didnt hold me like subutex did. The naloxone is so you cant bang it even though I know plenty who do. Over here after 1month they give you takeaways so you only go every third day and after 2-3 months they give you a months worth so you only go once a month which is awesome. Im on the propper brown done not that biodone shit.
I also fear its a needle addiction so much more that the actual gear sort of like smoking is the movement of my hand/arm etc.
I had some pure liquid fent off a vendor over here and it was fucking marvelous 2ml for $120 and get 5 shots at 40units which is 400mcg which is more than enough to gouch out proper.
The gear on here for me is about the same as on the street but the strength is so much better from 2 of the vendors litterally 1point and im nodding not like street gear where i have 3points easy and am not even fucked
Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: doodoo79 on September 28, 2013, 01:39 am
I was just gonna add my 2 btc to the Subutex subject. I'm on just 8mg a day and very rarely even take that much. I order a few grams of dope a month from SR and typically only get high every other week. It takes me about 2 days to start feeling bad when I stop taking Subutex. So what I do is place my order and once it's marked in transit I stop taking the Subutex. This always works out well for me because shipping is usually 2 days so by the time my dope gets here I'm off the Subutex long enough to actually feel the dope. Also, if anyone out there bangs their Subutex, be extremely careful not to miss, and don't cook it either as the Buprenorphine is water soluble and all cooking does is breaks down the binder. As far as missing goes, I've had several infections from missing when shooting subs. It's also hell on the veins and causes them to harden.

If anyone needs anything I've got some coin to lend, just let me know. Hope all are well this evening :)

Quote from: BoxofShapes on September 21, 2013, 07:59 pm
Personally I don't look at it as I am throwing my trust out there, even though I am partly.  I use this place as a way to tithe to be thankful that we are all here.  It's a wishing well to me.  A way for me to pay off my debt for being a piece of shit so long ago.
I like the wishing well analogy, and I've thought of such actions as tithes myself.

I've lost count of the many times I've been helped by the kindness of strangers, particularly in my late teens and early twenties. I think that on many occasions they actually saved my life and I so wish I could at least remember more of their faces.

Some people have told me that they don't give change to people on the street because they know so many of them are 'professional beggars' making hundreds of pounds per day. Such 'professionals' exist, it's true, I've even known some of them (and often continued giving them money after befriending them, knowing that the bulk of their money is lost to hidden expenses such as addictions). If it's an amount that will make little difference to my life, however, what does it matter if some of it is 'wasted'? The few true conmen and conwomen are an acceptable tax on the lottery of actually making someone's life a little better, if only for that day. Plus, of course, doing this makes me feel so much better about myself as well ;)

People breaking promises, of course, is a whole new set of values :D

Oh, hold on... It's September. Did you mean the 1st?

Quote from: BoxofShapes on September 21, 2013, 07:59 pm
Personally I don't look at it as I am throwing my trust out there, even though I am partly.  I use this place as a way to tithe to be thankful that we are all here.  It's a wishing well to me.  A way for me to pay off my debt for being a piece of shit so long ago.
I like the wishing well analogy, and I've thought of such actions as tithes myself.

I've lost count of the many times I've been helped by the kindness of strangers, particularly in my late teens and early twenties. I think that on many occasions they actually saved my life and I so wish I could at least remember more of their faces.

Some people have told me that they don't give change to people on the street because they know so many of them are 'professional beggars' making hundreds of pounds per day. Such 'professionals' exist, it's true, I've even known some of them (and often continued giving them money after befriending them, knowing that the bulk of their money is lost to hidden expenses such as addictions). If it's an amount that will make little difference to my life, however, what does it matter if some of it is 'wasted'? The few true conmen and conwomen are an acceptable tax on the lottery of actually making someone's life a little better, if only for that day. Plus, of course, doing this makes me feel so much better about myself as well ;)

People breaking promises, of course, is a whole new set of values :D

Damn.  He never got you back?  That's kind of disappointing.

Great post.  I was having a hard time putting it like that.  It is an acceptable tax to me.  (sometimes)  I've been on the other side of the coin of someone that genuinely needed something.  If someone else didn't find it acceptable I wouldn't have had a chance to better myself. 

Another reason I wanted to throw in I kind of forgot last time is this.  I'm buying drugs and having them shipped to my possession.  I'm kind of trying to throw some karma out there to "hedge my bets" for good luck.  I try to do the normal stuff for protection but I don't mind adding another layer on top.

Just my POV. 

Hugs all!

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: anonypunk on September 28, 2013, 05:25 pm
Quote from: doodoo79 on September 28, 2013, 01:39 am
I was just gonna add my 2 btc to the Subutex subject. I'm on just 8mg a day and very rarely even take that much. I order a few grams of dope a month from SR and typically only get high every other week. It takes me about 2 days to start feeling bad when I stop taking Subutex. So what I do is place my order and once it's marked in transit I stop taking the Subutex. This always works out well for me because shipping is usually 2 days so by the time my dope gets here I'm off the Subutex long enough to actually feel the dope. Also, if anyone out there bangs their Subutex, be extremely careful not to miss, and don't cook it either as the Buprenorphine is water soluble and all cooking does is breaks down the binder. As far as missing goes, I've had several infections from missing when shooting subs. It's also hell on the veins and causes them to harden.

If anyone needs anything I've got some coin to lend, just let me know. Hope all are well this evening :)
Can you plug it?

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: BoxofShapes on September 29, 2013, 08:54 pm
Yea PM me the vendor but I think I know who you are talking about.  The list is pretty small who deals with this.

I feel it's better.  I don't feel hung over the next day and it doesn't interfere with sleep.

All the warnings are kind of right that you hear though.  If you over do it or you will not be happy the next day.  There is a fine line with it.

But if you are sensible you will be fine.  Let me know what you think when you try it.  A lot of people are put off by what they think is true about this stuff so it's nice to hear the opposite!

Hi everyone, remember me?  I'd like to thank all of us  that together with Dan, BOS and RS, chem cat etal. and all the others I forget, who have made this thread and the community such a lovely thing
 
  A few of us who tried  to establish the guidelines and  a few months back when we thrashed out the rules and principles which really got this thread pumping in a good way, ,  and created the "friend-foe" list ..... as well as getting folks to be as honest and fair as possible

 More than one person has mentioned that this thread has restored their faith in humanity!

Anyhoo, I now find myself about $20 short on an order, I'm not sure what that is in Btc not quite 0.18Btcs, and if anyone could help it would be greatly appreciated

2 things, I cant return it for about 2 weeks and you'll have to pm me for my SR nym, as it's different, and I'd rather not advertise it here, if you can understand

   Suffice to say motek HAS helped many here and always keeps their word, although I've never borrowed here so I've yet to return any!

      just sorry about the delay in paying back, but I dont get paid till then and dont want to make any promises I cant keep!


Thanks in advance, take care my friends

If anyone is interested in investing in us any amount from 1000 euros to 5000 euros per person please contact us. We need to get a restock in and get the show back on the road.

Post by: staind on October 05, 2013, 03:23 am
Hello comrades!

I hope each and everyone of you is doing well despite these sad circumstances. We all lost way more than the contents of our wallets. I hope you will be able to overcome your material loss.


I'd like to invite the few remaining beneficiaries of my loans to donate the amount due to the following bitcoin address: 1DPRjkYXwmgvHo1vN4MmqA1bVfa226keMe
It is the "Ross Ulbricht Defense Fund" - **CLEARNET** www.rossulbricht.org

If you do not feel like supporting this cause, consider your debt settled. I will not accept a repayment in any other form. There are probably only about 0.5 btc of "legit" loans outstanding, but I'd love to see some of those kittens supporting a worthy cause.


I decided to keep using this alias, but solely for social purposes. It is not the smart thing to do, but making a new alias to talk to you people just wouldn't feel right. Honestly, I fell in love with this community and just hope we will eventually find a safe harbor. See you on the other side :).

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: foxen624 on October 05, 2013, 10:07 am
Hi people...  MY people...   I must admit..  I think I seriously went into some kind of a state of shock the other day when I saw the ultimate evil notice hanging outside the door of SR...   I somehow totally lost a whole day.,, no clue what happened to Friday... and it was not any sort of drug induced state either.  Sure, I do remember first being first very upset over this happening... then being extremely pissed at how the FBI has NO right to steal our bitcoins.  Idk whether or not people who had coin in their wallet were in fact sent to another wallet as it says in Account Settings... but I know that I had over $3 00.00 in escrow.... NOT for anything illegal.. definately not any kind of drug...  it was for a damn phone!  I'd placed the order at approx 3am - just hours before the site went down....  but I won't bitch too much about that as I'm sure that there are many others who lost a hell of a lot more than that in coin and probably quite a few their very livelyhood they depended on to feed their families >:(    And omg..  DPR..  maybe he made a few mistakes, but he's only human and for the enormous resonsibility he had to all of us as well as to runnng his business as smoothly as possible..  imo, he handled it as well as anyone could be expected to for as long as he did.  Of course, I don't know really what to believe.  I suppose most of you did as well... read the Inditement against him that's been pubished all over the internet..  it's very, very long...   but unless I missed something, it read as if tying Ross Ulbricht to being for absolute certain the same guy as is DPR  was for the most part speculation on the part of the Fucking Beaucratic Idiot ...  oh, I mean the FBI Agent who had written it up.  Actually, I got that from my friend who is a retired attorney...  he seems to think that just going by the Inditement, that DPR has a better chance than it would seem.   Then again, he was aware of the SR, but didn't really participate much..  so, of course he doesn't really know.... but it was a small ray of hope coming from a retired defense attorney's perspective.

Anyway, sorry about the rambling...  still trying to wrap my head around all this..   But there are two things mainly that I'd wanted to say...   One is that I was honeslty surprised to see that the forum is still open - although most certainly it's being not only monitored, but controlled by the FBI..  they must be hoping to find some more concrete evidence against DPR or something.. but I doubt that anyone is unaware of their presense, or that they would even if they could - which is unlikely - be writing any deep dark secrets that we wouldn't know about IF they even existed......  But, nonetheless, I must admit that I was pleased to find that the forum is still here...  mainly because I think that most of my "going into shock" over these sad curcumstances had a lot more to do with the fact that I have few people IRL that I feel as close to as I've come to feel towards some of the people I've met right here...  nameless, faceless.. doesn't matter...  I think that in a strange sort of way, I came to love some of you...  at least I came to care about you and looked forward every day/night that I had a moment to get on here.. just to make some contact with some of the kindest people left on earth as it seems to me.....

O.K. the other thing I was going to say... is that I just want to make clear that with all that has happened and that to some extent I'm sure that all of us have experienced some sort of loss to various extents... and the last thing I want now is for anyone who might have outstanding loans to me to pay me back.  So, PLEASE..  if anyone was considering it...  don't.  I see a post a few down by staind where he's asking people to put their outstanding loans into a wallet to take up a collection for DPR...   that is where I want anything owed to me to go as well... 

Now, enough of my silly rambling..   just..   *huge hugs* to Mary, cryngie, Kalli, ChemCat, Boxy, DantheIceCreamMan, staind, Defy, ImAz....   I tried but am sure I've missed quite a few who are so special as well...  luckily, you know who you are....  ;)  ::)   :'(    :-\ 

I got so much more to ramble on about... but I won't.. for now...  think I'll do some reading instead....

Love you all...  foxen...

Hi Mary!  Was just thinking of you (as well as mentioning you in the post I just made)...  guess I couldn't stay away either.  And whether they like it or not, Free Speech IS our constitutional right and you're absoluely right... nothing wrong with friends who may only have a short time left to talk with each other to take whatever time we have left to do what we've done since I've been here at least..   talk, care, share feelings, etc.....   

;)

Much love everyone and foxen you brought a tear to my eye, you're truly a good soul <3

Awwwww Kalli, not sure how I brought a tear to your eye... but you sure brought one or more to mine.  I think I'm gonna hang onto your post here along with the date (if you don't mind)... for a reason that may seem weird to many, but I've always had this peeve where it really bothers me that when a person dies, all these people suddenly have all these nice things to say about them that they probably would not have said while the person was alive.

The last part of your post says something so reminiscent of what people usually reserve for saying after it's too late.... except for the fact that you said it while I'm alive.  I do believe that it would be the first thing I've seen in writing meant personally for me in the current time.  I don't expect that to really make sense to anyone but me...   but just believe me that what you wrote in that sentence means a whole lot to me.  You are the truly good soul, Kalli <3

Title: Re: Oƒƒicia£ $par€ ₵oin Thread (Read OP!)
Post by: foxen624 on October 07, 2013, 08:14 am
My message to everyone in the SR Community who has been kind to me and especially to those who I have come to love and consider Family:

First of all, even though it may come across this way..  this is NOT "goodbye".  However, while I may change my mind once all the remaining shock and confusion over what all has transpired in the past week has cleared, I have decided, for the time being, to stop posting online... anywhere for an unknown period of time.

I really didn't know where even to put this post, but decided on this thread as this (actually the original OSCT, but I'm pretty sure that those still even on SR that I met there have moved to this new osct) is where I met those who are the most precious to me and who have given me something so important and so special that I don't even know what to call it.  I know I've mentioned several times that I don't have many people I can truly call friends IRL, and that is quite true.  I believe that a lot of the reason for this is that I think I was born distrustful of people by nature, and from an early age, I came to distrust all facets of government... perhaps simply "The Establishment" might cover that better.  But I also soon learned that rarely are people who they appear to be, even if you think you know them because you see them in person every day, visit their homes and vice verse, etc...  they also can just as easily be a sneaky subset of the establishment..   better known as rats, snitches, etc...   

I'm not saying that all people are rats, far from it.  I am fairly sure that over all, they make up a small minority of the population in general.  But still, there are other ways people have of stabbing each other in the back that doesn't involve snitching... and without going on anymore about all the things people may or may not be..  I'm just saying that for reasons known and unknown to me - at least on a conscious level, I keep to myself IRL, I rarely speak to the neighbors other than a casual "how are you doing" if necessary.  I mind my business and I make a point to not mind the  business of anyone else.  And I guess that combo doesn't make for a very good atmosphere in which to make friends.

And while I've participated in various clearnet forums to a certain extent (never have trusted those such as facebook, twitter, myspace, yahoo360, and others that are/were commonly known), I've never felt the kind of closeness I've felt with some of you and I trust that you each know who you are.  I'm not mentioning names because for one, whenever I try, I never fail to leave out at least about 10 unintentionally... and for another, for whatever reason, of all the people here I've come to truly care about and feel close to, still, there are some that I feel especially close to and I don't wish to sound discriminatory..  would rather just trust that you know who you are.  For as long as I'm away, I will miss all of you....  but it's those who have made me feel like I'm actually someone (I guess is the only way I know to put it).. someone worth mentioning, talking to and replying to..  You who have taken the loneliness that I've long since become used to living with, away for whatever length of time I've been able to be on here on the days I've been able to be here.  I don't even know how to come close to expressing how much that means to me.

There have been occasions where I've been able to be somewhat articulate - but obviously this is far from one of those so please bear with me as I'm trying to communicate feelings I don't have words for through these damned tears that won't quit.  Actually, I guess I've said about as much as I can put in words regarding the feelings, but I have a couple other things I want to say... just because I want to say them.

I'm well aware that I'm nowhere near as knowledgeable as many/most/all of you as far as technical things, in various areas of life experience, and probably lots of other things as well.  But I do have some mediocre common sense... and the one thing that I believe has kept me "safe" for most of my life which is my intuition (gut feelings, hunches, whatever people call it).  Even when my gut feeling is in direct opposition to what logic says, I've felt a stronger need to follow the gut feeling/intuition even when it seems to make no sense while logic makes perfect sense but it's pull is not as strong for me.  I know I'm not making much sense to anyone reading...  It's not for lack of trying.. it's just.... I don't know...  but anyway, I guess I'm saying this as much for myself as for you.... maybe....   ???

So anyway, in regards to my presence online in general and on SR in particular, logic tells me that personally, I'm probably pretty low on the list of priorities of the three letter agencies... if at all.  I mean, I'm not nor have I ever been a vendor/dealer/seller of anything on or offline.  As far as SR, I've made relatively few purchases and of those, the majority have been of btc, security related computer software and nothing that should get the Feds & Co. terribly excited.  Besides, they're running this forum now afaik, and if I've somehow caught their attention in any way (though I highly doubt it), they know exactly what I've purchased here, and that alone, says my logic, should remove any concern I could possibly have for my personal safety.  And, I'm noticing that more and more of you have already or are in the process of moving to BMR and or Sheep...  and being that around the same time as I made my account here at SR, I also made an account  at BMR under the same username as here - although I never wound up doing anything with the BMR account other than make like 4 or 5 posts in their forum - I figured that it's about time that I follow you guys/gals on over at least to BMR where I already have an account. 

Matter of fact, I just came from there.  I saw many SR names that I am familiar with having seen in these forums and a few that are of those whom I'm primarily addressing here.  I did a lot of reading... still lots of theories going around about what really happened..  although this bit is irrelevant for the most part to this post, as I ramble on, things just pop in my head and I mention them.  All I'm going to say now though regarding the multiple theories concerning DPR and if it was his fault, and/or theories springing up accusing various members of being undercover agents, etc..   is that all I know for certain, and unless there really are some SR members with special inside knowledge, is the same as everyone else knows for certain which is that all the information that has been put out concerning the demise of SR has been supplied by the government itself and the media who writes their stories (except for the [supposedly] actual federal indictment that has been published all over the internet, which was written directly by government agents and only published by the various media outlets) neither of which can be trusted...  So that to me equals NO real knowledge by anyone of what really happened. 

Anyway, back to what I was trying to say....  shortly after I made my one post today in BMR, for no apparent reason that makes any sense, my "intuition" suddenly kicked in and told me that it's time... NOW for me to get out.  At least for the time being and to lose my username forever.  This particular type of intuition that hits me in such a way has been the only thing in my life that has never let me down.  I have always followed it even when I did not want to, even when all logic said otherwise... and while sometimes it's been years before I find out that had I listened to reason rather than this weird but not to be ignored intuition, I'd have been dead, in a mental institution or some such type place I'd rather not be - dead? well.. not ready for that yet either.  So, as much as this makes no sense to me, I'm sure it doesn't to you either..  but as I said in the beginning of this post, I'm not saying goodbye.  But, I am saying that I'm not going to be around for however long it takes until I feel "safe" to return... by which time I suspect this forum will be long gone ...  but I will find you guys/gals wherever you are...  BRM, Sheep, wherever...  although common sense (intuition hasn't weighed in on this one) tells me that BMR is probably already in he crosshairs of the feds, as is probably Sheep (which I don't really know anything about other than that I've seen a lot of people say they are going there as well as BMR)... although I hope with all my heart that I'm wrong on this as I truly wish for no more harm to come to anyone.. anyone at all, whether I know them or not who is trying to pick up the pieces and carry on with their lives at a different url. 

As for me, while I must admit that it has been a good feeling just knowing that there is/was a place where virtually anything a person could want of the physical world is only a mouse click away... still, I could leave the market without much trouble... it's the forum..  at least certain threads in it that I'm having the real trouble with...  the people who have made me feel alive, given me such joy and so much more... I'll miss you all terribly during the time that I am feeling that I must stay away.  And when I do  return...  I meant it when I said that I will find yous..  although I won't be using the same username, so it will probably take a while.. if ever for anyone to recognize me as being the same person as I am inside that you have gotten to know here.. as I am under any moniker.

Until we meet again....  nothing but the best of everything to all of you...  my closest SR family and extended..  and all... 

Much love,

~foxen

P.S.  I have the link to the backup thread, but I've read in several places that it's not safe to use it while this forum is still up.  I've also read that regardless, the backup forum is active now anyway.  I'm not going to go there as long as this forum is up and as long as I feel as if it would not be "safe" for whatever other reason.  But, I forgot about that as I was writing my long message here, so just want to say that as of now, I've not completely ruled out the idea of going there possibly sooner than I'd thought I'd feel comfortable posting again online.  And...   I'll probably be lurking without signing in... just to get a feel of the atmosphere and such.....   again...  love you all!
